model

Enum IRCUserMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<IRCUserMode>
      • model.IRCUserMode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<IRCUserMode>, IRCMode

    public enum IRCUserMode
extends java.lang.Enum<IRCUserMode>
implements IRCMode
    Represents an IRCUserMode.

    Service admin('a'), deaf ('d'), Rw GlobOps LocOps('g'), Registered('r'), vhost('t'), secure connection('z'), no ctcps('T') are not standard and may not work in another server other than Unreal.

    Author:
    Tomas
